The datapad has information about Magmatron's DNA project that ended 
up creating Jynx and Dachande.

::Zardus::

"I can see you and Squizzy arn't going to get along well." Zardus 
says after thinking over Lady Hawk's reply, "Allright, you'll work 
alone, but there will be a bot supervising you. Would you preffer 
that?"

Zardus wanted the best possible product from this, and as long as it 
was properly supervised, it didn't really matter if there were two 
scientists working on it or one.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Lady Hawk took the datapad and scanned the information. (What 
exactly is she
> looking at?) "I'm stuck here, it would be senseless to refuse." she 
read
> more carefully hopin to know enough about her fathers technology to 
fool
> Zardus. "As long as Squizzy keeps her paws off MY technology." the 
royal
> bird intended to be a royal pain as long as she could to keep the 
wool over
> Zardus' eyes.
